snippet: The girls were kidnapped early Tuesday from a state school in the heartland of the Boko Haram insurgency, startling a country already numbed by a steady drumbeat of horrific episodes attributed to the Islamist militant group.
abstract: Dozens of schoolgirls abducted by armed Boko Haram militants remain missing amid fears that they will be turned into sex slaves and cooks if they are not rescued.
lead_paragraph: The girls were kidnapped early Tuesday from a state school in the heartland of the Boko Haram insurgency, startling a country already numbed by a steady drumbeat of horrific episodes attributed to the Islamist militant group.

headline.main: Nigeria Fears Captive Girls Will Be Held as Sex Slaves
headline.print_headline: Nigeria Fears Captive Girls Will Be Held as Sex Slaves
